column4: Having MAJOR problems re-installing VMWare on a re-install of Hoary.  Problems related to gcc.  Can someone help?
export CC=gcc-3.4
if you have gcc-3.4 installed
I tried that - no joy.
read the rest of the error.  it says your kernel was compiled with one version of gcc and your compiler is this version.  what are the details?
and yes gcc-3.4 is installed in /usr/bin
can copy a portion of the error message if you want
if it's a one-liner, feel free
else use the pastebin
it's a little long - Never used the paste bin, how do I?
/topic
figured out pastebin - the error info is in 4068
link?
http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl/4068
For proper build you'll have to replace gcc with symbolic link to /usr/bin/gcc-3.3
translation: ln -s /usr/bin/gcc-3.3 /usr/bin/gcc
or ln -sf if it already exists
wow could have sworn that was one of two dozen things I tried about 2AM, but I'll try again.
Bless You, thank you, it f***ing worked!!!!!!
I forgot which problem what yours :)
oh you were the vmware guy.  you're welcome :)
Molto grazie.  ciao.
any time
